Package io.odysz.semantic.DA

Class Connects

java.lang.Object
io.odysz.semantic.DA.Connects
public class Connects extends Object
Connection configurations and DB table meta data manager.
Author:
odys-z@github.com

      compose paged sql, e.g. for Oracle:
      select * from (sql) t where rownum > 0 and row num < 14
      Parameters:

      size -
      Returns:

    • uri2conn

      public static String uri2conn(String uri) throws SemanticException
      Mapping client function id to data connection according to configuration. Uri pattern is matched with prefix of strings' in db config.xml.
      Parameters:
      uri -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      SemanticException - uri is null
